solution.text:
x = _{{115*k}}_
\(\Rightarrow\) Since X and Y are inversely proportional XY = K
\(\Rightarrow\) Therefore, K \(= (529 \times _{j}_) \times (5 \times _{k}_) = 2645 \times _{j}_ \times _{k}_\)
\(\Rightarrow\) Hence, when y \(= 23 \times _{j}_\)
\(\Rightarrow\) x \(= \frac {2645 \times _{j}_ \times _{k}_}{23 \times _{j}_}\)
\(\Rightarrow\) x = _{{115*k}}_
